sage.scene

Class HUDImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.HUDObject
          • sage.scene.HUDImage

  • public class HUDImage
extends HUDObject
    HUDImage defines a HUDObject which consists of a Texture mapped Rectangle located in the camera's viewport.
    HUDImage do not support transparency. Therefore transparent portions of an image file are rendered as black. This is do to the limitation that SAGE currently does not support transparency.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett
